page.title: 08MRS FLAVELL,BAGINTON 2
page.content: The airfield was built in 1930 and a village hall in 1948.Baginton had a Home Guard and A.R.P.wardens.Today there is a more transient population due to work re-locations.New houses (50)have been built in Roman Way and 20 others at the other end of the vil lage.Old Home Farm has been developed into The Mews.Industry is represented by the Alvis test works and Sprayfast. The village hall is the centre of social activity e.g.The play group, the youth club,the entertainment club and the W.I. to name just a few.It is also used for dances and local functions.There are two fairs each year in May and November.These are held in the village hall and the adjoining land and includes the crowning of the May Queen.
